wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Stirrat (born 30 June 1970) is a male Scottish former international cyclist. He competed in the track time trial at the 1992 Summer Olympics.Stirrat is a multiple British National champion, winning the track time trial title once, the Scratch title twice and the team sprint title once. He also represented Scotland in three track events at the 1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
